questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Drinks and river

Where was the photo taken?
A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) Inside a museum
D) At a riverside cafe

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) The bridge in the background
B) The drinks on the table
C) The people in the scene
D) The natural landscape

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A person
B) A tree
C) A glass of drink
D) A plate of food

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A bridge
B) A river
C) Two glasses of drinks
D) A group of people

A) A busy street
B) A bridge and a river
C) A large building
D) A forest

A) A skyscraper
B) A suspension bridge
C) A historical monument
D) A residential building

B) Yellow
C) Red/Brown
D) Green

A) Grass
B) Sand
C) A table
D) A rock
